Package averycowan.event

This project does event handling and listener management in the runtime.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Event
    This interface is for tagging all event types.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    EventListener
    Extend this class when making an event listener.
    EventManager
    This class handles all events.

Package averycowan.event Description

This project does event handling and listener management in the runtime. This removes the need for a different handler for each exception. Just make the events and listener, and it does the rest. The first step is to create your Event implementation. Lets call this CustomEvent. Next, create an extension to EventListener for your Event. Call EventManager.addListener(EventListener listener); with your custom EventListener. When there is an event, call EventManager.handleEvent(new CustomEvent(?????)); from the event source and you listener will get it.
Author:
Avery Cowan
See Also:
EventManager
